Class Check

java.lang.Object
Check
public class Check extends Object
The Check class provides functionality for validating, converting and formatting amounts of a check Class handles amount validation, formatting, and conversion to words
Author:
bmiller38

  • Method Details

    • validateAmount

      public static void validateAmount(String num)
      Validates a string representation of a check amount For it to work: - Has exactly 2 decimal points - Can't exceed max character length - If it contains commas they must be formatted correctly
      Parameters:
      num - The string representation of the check amount to validate
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the amount is invalid

    • validateComma

      private static void validateComma(String num)
      Validates that commas in the number part of an amount are correctly placed Should separate thousands place and only be used once
      Parameters:
      num - The string representation of the whole number part (left of decimal)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if commas are not formatted correctly

    • protectedAmount

      public static String protectedAmount(double amount)
      Formats a double into a protected string representation The representation fills empty spaces with asterisks (*)
      Parameters:
      amount - The double amount to format
      Returns:
      String The protected string representation of amount
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if amount exceeds max amount
